name: digital love - space email theme
description: A theme for Space Email based off of Digital: A Love Story, a (free!!) indie game that you should totally play. Space Email always reminded me of Digital and I got a few emails saying the same (and people reproducing emails from inside the game which is adorable), so it seemed like a logical progression. It only affects the main Space Email page, none of the others on the site (such as the splash page or FAQ) - this is intentional, trying to skin them was buggy and you don't visit them often anyway. Please see the info section below for additional quirks.
additional_info: If you encounter a bug with Space Email while using this style, please disable it and attempt to reproduce the bug before you contact Space Email's developer. I don't want them to have to deal with troubleshooting if it's a mistake on my end. I made more changes than usual with this one so it may be more prone to bugs. If you encounter a bug you believe is related to the style (a color looking wrong, unreadable text, etc), please contact me either here or on my tumblr so I can try to resolve it. If you have a paid account you may notice that when changing your message color, the colors look kind of weird. This is because the default colors do not look so good on the light blue background. I cannot alter the message color selection, the code is probably hidden to prevent non-paid users from exploiting it. Sorry! However, when you receive a message in a different color, it will look just fine, because I CAN alter how received messages are displayed. (See screenshot #1 for an example of red text.) also, because text is white by default here, emails with the color set to white will show as black instead. 7/20/2014 - initial release.
